name: Fuel Dashboard Design for Fleet Management
description:
Fuel is a significant factor in calculating finance of any trucking industry where a lot of work depends on a large fleet of vehicles.


Hence, efficient management of fuel in the fleet can impact on the revenue. However, developing a dashboard is the best way to get real-time data on fuel usage.


Have a look at the dashboard design-build by our designer and drop an inquiry if you are looking for a custom fuel management dashboard for your enterprise.


Also, check out our article on how to start fuel delivery service.
